data.title: Shaved Ice Treats w/ 100 Flavors & 150+ Locations
data.meta_description: Pelican's SnoBalls is the leading shaved-ice provider. Offering 100 flavors at hundreds of locations, the Pelican's SnoBalls revolution is now.
data.meta_site_name: Pelican's SnoBalls - Original New Orleans Shaved Ice
data.text:
Parties & Events

Have “Pelican’s SnoBalls” at your next event!

Looking to make your next event extra special? We can serve our World Famous SnoBalls at just about any event! Our Base Starter Package is up to 75 Kiddie SnoBalls with 1 hour of full service, we can always stay longer and bring more SnoBalls for an additional charge. Please contact your local Pelican’s location for pricing information! We are so excited to bring the bold flavor and unique fun of our colorful shaved ice to your next special event, just send us a request below and Taste Happy!

School Events

Festivals

Community Gatherings

Church Celebrations

Corporate Events

Larger gatherings 300+ people

Submit an Event Request

Franchise

Own your own “Pelican’s SnoBalls”!

Owning a Pelican’s SnoBalls stand can be a rewarding opportunity! Our franchise is quickly growing with over 200 locations across the country. Franchise owners have the support of a network of owners and the excitement of connecting to their local community by delivering fun, bold flavors in our unique shaved ice.

Want to learn more? Click the button below!

Learn About Franchising

This information is not intended as an offer to sell, or the solicitation of an offer to buy, a franchise. It is for information purposes only. Currently, the following states regulate the offer and sale of franchises: California, Hawaii, Illinois, Indiana, Maryland, Michigan, Minnesota, New York, North Dakota, Oregon, Rhode Island, South Dakota, Virginia, Washington, and Wisconsin. Within the U.S.A., we offer franchises solely by means of our Franchise Disclosure Document. There are also countries outside the U.S.A. that have laws governing the offer and sale of franchises. If you are a resident of one of these states or countries, we will not offer you a franchise unless and until we have complied with pre-sale registration and disclosure requirements that apply in your jurisdiction.
